name: Water Chaos
description:
Clownfish floating alone in the ocean stumbles upon a strange object that creates amazing instabilities in the underwater kingdom, all living creatures are now like a puppet in someone's hands, but while chaos is being created, Clownfish decided to collect some pearls!

Water Chaos - 2d physical game where the player needs to control the fish with the help of four selected directions, and together with it, all other marine life, but many of which can harm the player, and some simply do not allow you to swim in the right direction in order to reach the goal and collect all the lost pearls!

Game Features:
-Pixel Art
- Management of the Physical World
- 3 Unique Biomes
- 33 levels!
